mapper.sql: mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.remark, mcp.status, mcp.request_date, mcp.pay_date, mcp.start_date, mcp.end_date, mcp.star_rate, mcp.review, mcp.review_date, mcp.etc
m.member_no, m.id, m.name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email
mapper.select: select mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.remark, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.request_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as request_date, mcp.pay_date, mcp.start_date, mcp.end_date, mcp.star_rate, mcp.review, mcp.review_date, mcp.etc, cp.name as program_name, m.member_no, m.id, m.photo, m.name as member_name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = mcp.program_no where cp.coach_no = #{no} and mcp.status REGEXP ('요청대기중|결제대기중')

select mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.remark, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.request_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as request_date, mcp.pay_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.start_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as start_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.end_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as end_date, mcp.star_rate, mcp.review, mcp.review_date, mcp.etc, cp.name as program_name, m.member_no, m.id, m.photo, m.name as member_name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = mcp.program_no where mcp.member_program_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update member_coaching_programs set review=#{review}, review_date=now() where member_program_no=#{memberCoachingProgramNo}
mapper.select: select member_program_no, member_no, mcp.program_no, remark, status, request_date, pay_date, start_date, end_date, star_rate, review, DATE_FORMAT(review_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as review_date, etc, c.name program_name from member_coaching_programs mcp join coaching_programs c on mcp.program_no=c.program_no where mcp.program_no=#{no}

select member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, remark, status, request_date, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as pay_date, start_date, end_date, star_rate, review, DATE_FORMAT(review_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as review_date, etc, cp.name program_name, cp.fee as fee, m.name as member_name from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on mcp.program_no=cp.program_no where cp.coach_no = #{no} AND pay_date IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: insert into member_coaching_programs( member_no, program_no, remark, status, request_date, start_date, end_date ) values( #{memberNo}, #{programNo}, #{remark}, '요청대기중', now(), #{startDate}, #{startDate} )
